description: This file defines an Inventory API service module that provides functions for interacting with inventory-related REST API endpoints, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting inventory items according to a FastAPI OpenAPI specification.

methods.name: listInventory({ skip = 0, limit = 10, category, search } = {})
methods.description: List inventory items with optional filters such as skip, limit, category, and search.

methods.name: createInventoryItem(payload)
methods.description: Create a new inventory item using provided payload data.

methods.name: getInventoryItem(itemId)
methods.description: Retrieve a single inventory item by its ID.

methods.name: updateInventoryItem(itemId, payload)
methods.description: Update an existing inventory item identified by its ID with new data.

methods.name: deleteInventoryItem(itemId)
methods.description: Delete an inventory item by its ID.

ctags.name: listInventory
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listInventory({ skip = 0, limit = 10, category, search } = {}) {$/
